parameters.filterByFormula: AND({Processing Status} = 'Ready for SMS', {Lead Source} = 'Standard Form', NOT({SMS Stop}), NOT({Booked}), NOT({Current Coaching Client}), {Phone Valid}, NOT(BLANK({Imported At})))

parameters.jsCode: const leads=$('Filter: Min 60 Minutes').all().map(i=>i.json);const templates=$input.all().map(i=>i.json.fields||i.json);const settings=$('Check 8 AM - 8 PM ET').first().json;const FORM_TO_SLUG={'TEST_INTERNAL':'test_internal','2149174698':'chatgpt_use_cases','2149319130':'Q4 2025 Webinar','2149013599':'vsl_500k_1m','2148019984':'rad_goals','2148913386':'topical_mindset','2148184964':'inward_outward','2147937751':'top10_traits','2148265042':'call_booked','2147867344':'consensus_building','2147904936':'impactful_meetings','2147983338':'executive_email','2148087527':'weekly_scorecard','2147886939':'opportunity_cost','2148989754':'executive_outreach','2148989802':'killer_proposal','2148989816':'income_planner','2148989824':'problem_mapping','2147877779':'pricing_rules','2148730236':'fundamentals_training','2148138291':'predict_selling','2148166902':'vsl_500k_1m'};const templateCache={};templates.forEach(t=>{const campaign=t.Campaign||'';if(campaign)templateCache[campaign]=t;});const results=[];const missing=[];leads.forEach(lead=>{const formId=lead['Form ID']||'';const campaignSlug=FORM_TO_SLUG[formId]||'default_nurture';const template=templateCache[campaignSlug];if(!template){missing.push({form_id:formId,slug:campaignSlug,lead_id:lead.id});return;}const firstName=lead['First Name']||'there';let messageBody=template.Body||'';if(!messageBody){missing.push({lead_id:lead.id,error:'empty_body'});return;}messageBody=messageBody.replace(/\{\{first_name\}\}/gi,firstName);const phoneRaw=lead.Phone||lead['Phone']||'';let phone=phoneRaw.toString().replace(/[^0-9]/g,'');if(phone.startsWith('1')&&phone.length===11){phone=phone.substring(1);}if(phone.length!==10){missing.push({lead_id:lead.id,error:'invalid_phone',phone:phoneRaw,cleaned:phone,length:phone.length});return;}const testMode=settings.test_mode||false;const testPhone=(settings.test_phone||'').toString().replace(/[^0-9]/g,'');const finalTestPhone=testPhone.startsWith('1')&&testPhone.length===11?testPhone.substring(1):testPhone;const finalPhone=(testMode&&finalTestPhone)?finalTestPhone:phone;results.push({...lead,message_text:messageBody,phone_digits:finalPhone,original_phone:phone,campaign:campaignSlug,template_id:template.id,test_mode:testMode,execution_id:settings.execution_id,account_phone:settings.account_phone});});if(results.length===0){throw new Error(`NO MESSAGES\nMissing: ${JSON.stringify(missing)}\nTemplates: ${Object.keys(templateCache).join(', ')}`);}return results.map(lead=>({json:lead}));

const leads=$input.all().map(i=>i.json.fields||i.json);const settings=$('Check 8 AM - 8 PM ET').first().json;const testMode=settings.test_mode||false;if(!testMode){return leads.map(l=>({json:l}));}const TEST_PHONES=['8319990767','8319990500'];const filtered=leads.filter(l=>{const phone=(l.Phone||'').replace(/[^0-9]/g,'').replace(/^1/,'');return TEST_PHONES.includes(phone);});console.log(`[TEST FILTER] ${leads.length} -> ${filtered.length} (phones: ${TEST_PHONES.join(', ')})`);return filtered.map(l=>({json:l}));

project.name: UYSP Lead Qualification Agent
project.description: Automated lead qualification and SMS outreach system that processes Kajabi form submissions, enriches B2B leads through two-phase qualification, scores them 0-100 using AI, and sends personalized SMS to qualified prospects while maintaining strict compliance and cost controls.
